patthana21.46:1.1_0: Naāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.46:2.1_0: Nanoāsavaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana21.46:2.1_1: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.46:3.1_2: adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.46:4.1_0: Noāsavaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ,
